item.title: Raleigh Ghosts and Ghouls Hauntings Tour
item.description:
Set out on an unforgettable adventure through Raleigh’s eerie streets with our thrilling walking ghost tour!
Led by a seasoned local guide who blends expert knowledge of haunted history with masterful storytelling, this tour will take you to the city's most haunted sites.
As you wander through the district, uncover chilling tales of the lost colony of Sir Walter Raleigh and the ghostly echoes of Civil War battles. Each stop on this mile-long journey is steeped in intrigue and mystery.
Stand on haunted ground at iconic sites like the State Capitol, White-Holman House, Haywood Hall, and the Executive Mansion. Though we can’t enter private buildings, the stories shared will transport you back in time, immersing you in the spectral presence that lingers.
This tour offers more than just a walk—it’s an engaging experience that will leave you captivated and spooked.
Join us for an evening of ghostly exploration and discover why Raleigh is known as one of the South’s most haunted cities!

image.alt: Raleigh Ghosts and Ghouls Hauntings Tour

item.title: Private Pedicab Tour of Downtown Raleigh
item.description: As the capital city of North Carolina, Raleigh has some of the most popular attractions and landmarks in the state. Whether it’s your first visit or if you’re revisiting, this private pedicab tour will provide you with an introduction to downtown. You’ll hop in a pedicab and cruise through the city, passing by sites like the recently renovated Moore Square, the North Carolina State Capitol, and the Historic Oakwood neighborhood.

image.alt: Private Pedicab Tour of Downtown Raleigh

item.title: Raleigh Historian-Guided Downtown Walking Tour
item.description: This guide is hosted by a local historian who will provide you a unique perspective in the history of Raleigh. Our guide has worked as an exhibit creator, educator, and researcher for multiple local museums and historical organizations, and will provide an unmatched level of expertise. Guests will observe beautiful architecture and absorb fascinating stories from Raleigh's past.

image.alt: Raleigh Historian-Guided Downtown Walking Tour

item.title: Raleigh Guided E-bike Tour: Ghosts, Mystery, Creepy History
item.description:
Do you enjoy a good ghost tour? Experience haunted spirits at Dorothea Dix Insane Asylum. See what makes Meredith College a ghostly hotspot. Talk to spirits with real witching rods... and lots more!
Plus, enjoy the gorgeous e-bike ride on "Art to Heart Trail" on the NC Greenway while learning fun and interesting history (and legends) about Raleigh. Don't miss out on this fun, unique, wild tour!

image.alt: Raleigh Guided E-bike Tour: Ghosts, Mystery, Creepy History

item.title: Guided Walking Historian Tour in Downtown Durham
item.description: This tour is hosted by a local historian who will provide you with a unique perspective on the history of Durham. Our guide has worked as an exhibit creator, educator, and researcher for local museums and historical organizations, and will provide a well-loved level of expertise. Guests will observe beautiful architecture and absorb fascinating stories from Durham's past, ranging from its origins as a tobacco processing center to its growth to become one of the most innovative and fastest-growing cities in the American South.

image.alt: Guided Walking Historian Tour in Downtown Durham

item.title: Tour of Downtown Raleigh on a Rickshaw, with Triangle Cycle Tours
item.description: Discover the charm of Raleigh, NC through a unique lens with our captivating Rickshaw tours. Lets us whisk you away on a delightful journey through the city's historic streets, lush parks and vibrant neighborhoods. Our knowledgeable guides will regale you with fascinating tales and insider insights, ensuring an unforgettable experience for visitors and locals alike. Book your tour today and let us pedal you through the heart of NC's capital city!

image.alt: Tour of Downtown Raleigh on a Rickshaw, with Triangle Cycle Tours

item.title: Raleigh Guided E-Bike Tour: Burgers, Brews, and History too
item.description: Come visit Triangle Adventures just outside Raleigh, NC! Our most popular guided e-bike tour, the original one. Experience fan favorite local hotspots. Local fun facts and history along the way. Exhilarating e-bike ride along the Mountains to Sea Trail. Delicious lunch and beer included (bean burger and non-alcoholic drinks can be substituted.) Great way to get outdoors and enjoy nature on a pedal assisted e-bike (no actual pedaling required)!

image.alt: Raleigh Guided E-Bike Tour: Burgers, Brews, and History too

item.title: Raleigh Guided E-Bike Tour: Tacos, Taps, and Local Facts
item.description: Come visit Triangle Adventures just outside Raleigh, NC! Our newest adventure, for lovers of tacos! Experience the best local authentic Mexican food The Triangle has to offer. Local fun facts, gorgeous scenery, and history along the way. Delicious lunch and beer included (vegetarian options and non-alcoholic drinks can be substituted.) Enjoy the outdoors on a pedal assisted e-bike (no actual pedaling required).

image.alt: Raleigh Guided E-Bike Tour: Tacos, Taps, and Local Facts

item.title: Durham African-American Historic Walking Tour
item.description:
Durham is a special site in the African American experience. The city served as a thriving hub of business and commerce, an economic refuge, and a symbol of progress. Visitors like W.E.B. DuBois and Booker T. Washington marveled at the city as a model for the black middle class, and it's no wonder why when you learn what Durham's African American population achieved: from the foundation of the largest black-owned company of the 20th Century to the formation of a brick-making juggernaut that physically built much of the city, and much, much more.
Durham also hosts "Parrish Street", the best preserved "black business district" in the country, an attraction that leaves quite the impression.
This tour is hosted by a local historian who wants to share his love of Durham's history with you. Travel between these sites and gain a new perspectives on the triumphs and challenges of Durham's history.

image.alt: Durham African-American Historic Walking Tour

item.title: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Chapel Hill NC
item.description:
Step into the shoes of a newly-minted detective, tasked by Commander Mahoney to solve a gripping case... murder on the streets of Chapel Hill, NC.
Throughout this crime-solving audio adventure, visit each of the 10 mapped locations. You'll have the option to explore the downtown area using the Walking Map or follow a Driving Map on the city's outskirts. Once you choose, the exact starting point will be revealed. *See images for route.
Park or stop at each location, listen to the audio story, and put your detective skills to the test by gathering clues and piecing together the evidence. Finally, make your deductions and issue an arrest warrant.
Your overall detective skills will be evaluated, culminating in a Case Performance Score to measure your sleuthing prowess. This game is suitable for solo detectives, dynamic duos, or groups of mystery enthusiasts, offering an immersive audio tale filled with intrigue.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Chapel Hill NC

item.title: Raleigh True Crime Tour
item.description: This tour focuses on the history of some of the strangest and most disturbing stories of true crime in the history of Raleigh. It is hosted by a local historian and veteran of the museum industry, which allows us to weave these stories from Raleigh's dark history into what makes the tour so special.

image.alt: Raleigh True Crime Tour

item.title: Raleigh Downtown Smartphone Guided GPS App Walking Tour
item.description: See The historic sites and discover the story of this city. Go at your own pace, anytime. This tour is all location aware and guided by our walking tour app. It's hands free. Put the phone in your pocket and it plays as you walk. the narration is spooky an infused with spooky music to fit the stories. Walk through the parks, the markets, the restaurants, the southern food joints, see the historical buildings and statues and streets and discover the past and present of Raleigh. Get to know the city in one hour. And find the best spot in town for southern cooking.

image.alt: Raleigh Downtown Smartphone Guided GPS App Walking Tour

item.title: Chapel Hill Ghost Walk
item.description: C﻿reepy spirits who inhabit an old auditorium, a haunted forest, an old mansion filled with the souls of those who once resided there, a haunted hotel room, and more. Join us on the Chapel Hill Ghost Walk, and maybe experience a taste of the supernatural for yourself.

image.alt: Chapel Hill Ghost Walk

item.title: Create Your Own Lipstick or Lip Gloss Class Experience in Raleigh
item.description: There's no need to look for the perfect lipstick color when you can make it at Lip Print Beauty Bar! In this one-of-a-kind workshop, a trained lip artists, will guide each participant through the steps to create a custom lipstick, lip gloss, or lip oil. Lip artists can also provide recommendations for lip colors that will look good on you based on your skin undertones. When you visit Lip Print Beauty Bar, you will leave with the perfect lippie and a great and fun experience!

image.alt: Create Your Own Lipstick or Lip Gloss Class Experience in Raleigh

item.title: Durham Dash Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Durham Dash Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Raleigh by Wacky Walks
item.description: Discover the best of Raleigh in a fun way with this city-wide scavenger hunt. Solve clues and answer trivia questions to find a variety of items scattered around the city. Your team gets points for every item it finds as well as completing other fun challenges. A live, remote host is with you throughout the hunt to help your team out along the way.

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Raleigh by Wacky Walks

item.title: Self Guided Durham Scavenger Hunt: Bricks, Bulls & Beauty
item.description: If you’re looking for a fun way to discover Durham, North Carolina, then look no further than this app-led scavenger hunt. Your goal is to complete challenges and find objects all over the city, taking in the sights as you go. Each object found earns you points and puts you closer to being crowned the scavenger hunt king or queen.

image.alt: Self Guided Durham Scavenger Hunt: Bricks, Bulls & Beauty

item.title: Raleigh African American History Tour
item.description: This guide is hosted by a local historian who will provide you a unique perspective on Raleigh's African American History. The guide has worked as a professional researcher and educator at multiple Raleigh historical museums, including those with a special interest in African American history.

image.alt: Raleigh African American History Tour

item.title: Raleigh Puzzling Adventure
item.description: With this self-guided Raleigh scavenger hunt tour, exploring the city’s enclaves becomes a game. Solve puzzles and decode brain teasers that lead you to top sights around the city. Because the entire activity is on your smartphone, you can start and stop on your own schedule and play with as many people as you want.

image.alt: Raleigh Puzzling Adventure

item.title: Private transportation
item.description: Based in Raleigh, We provide comfortable and convenient group travel services to various destinations. We offer a hassle-free travel experience to our customers. Whether you are planning a family vacation, a corporate retreat or a weekend getaway with friends, we are here to help you get there.

image.alt: Private transportation

item.title: Axe Throwing Training
item.description: Interested in safely unleashing your inner lumberjack? This small-group axe-throwing lesson can help, offering certified axe coaches that teach safety, form, and technique to help you land more bullseyes. Groups are divided into teams to battle it out in contests for prizes and to win the titles of Axe King and Axe Queen.

image.alt: Axe Throwing Training

item.title: Carolina Hurricanes Ice Hockey Game Ticket at Lenovo Center
item.description:
The Carolina Hurricanes offer a one-of-a-kind live hockey experience that combines passionate fan support, high-energy gameplay, and a fun atmosphere. Known for their "Caniac" fan base, the Hurricanes have fostered an incredibly loyal and enthusiastic crowd that makes the Lenovo Center a buzzing, electric venue on game day.
On the ice, the Hurricanes are a fast, high-intensity team with a relentless forecheck and skillful puck movement. Head Coach Rod Brind'Amour has built a squad known for its up-tempo style and strong team defense, making them a contender for the playoffs.
Lenovo Center known for its innovative architecture, including the iconic "eye" sculpture at the entrance, offers a warm and friendly atmosphere. The arena boasts modern amenities and a vibrant atmosphere that really makes the game-day experience. Moreover, attending a game at Lenovo Center allows you to truly experience the culture of the city of Raleigh making for an unforgettable viewing experience!

image.alt: Carolina Hurricanes Ice Hockey Game Ticket at Lenovo Center

item.title: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Raleigh by Operation City Quest
item.description: Get to know Raleigh in a fun and adventurous way with this app-led scavenger hunt by Operation City Quest. Download the app on your phone and follow the instructions to complete a number of challenges. Take photos, collect points, and see how you stack up against other teams on the leaderboard.

image.alt: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Raleigh by Operation City Quest

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Raleigh by 3Quest Challenge
item.description: From its museums to its craft breweries and nature preserves, Raleigh offers plenty of riches to explore. Get to know the North Carolina capital on a fun and interactive scavenger hunt. This app-based game will send you out on three different quests, each with a list of items to find and challenges to perform. A live remote host will be available to guide you through this challenging activity.

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Raleigh by 3Quest Challenge
